personal_statement_what_to_improve: Whilst your personal statement was a good starting point, it didn't really tell us enough about you to decide whether you'd suit our course. It was limited in content and only really mentioned your own children rather than education generally.
quality_of_application_what_to_improve: Further capture a providers attention by bringing to life scenarios you have witnessed or been involved in. When small children do 'achieve the smallest of things' what does this mean to them - and you as their teacher? How and why do you want to do this as a career?
quality_of_application_other_reason_deta: Your experience is secondary science technician, and whilst you said you wanted to teach an infant level, we didn't really grasp why - the statement was lacking passion.
